text:
@GovAbbott I see you've taken a page out of the @realDonaldTrump playbook...blame others for your failures... leaders lead... weaklings blame others for their failures and incompetence. #WeakPresident #WeakGovernor #GregAbbott
https://t.co/dZfZfT4F5o
